column2:
"You'll get it for me? Wonderful! You just
made my day. I thought I was going to have
to get it myself."
"What? Why wouldn't it be a good idea?"

"That's right...
Even though I'm an ARKS,
I'm just a cook in the galley..."

"But if you'll go do it for me, I could just stay here,
safe and sound, and start thinking up some new
recipes."

"Woodan meat seems so nice and juicy, I'm sure I
could come up with a tasty dish. Don't keep me
waiting too long, okay?"

"あなたが行ってくれるの？
嬉しいわぁー！
私、自分で行くつもりでいたのよ。"

"そりゃそうよね……
アークスのメンバーとはいっても
厨房所属のコックだもんね……"

"でも私、あなたが行ってくれるなら
安心して待っていられるわ。"

"ウーダンは身が締まってるから
きっとおいしく調理できると思うの。
楽しみに待ってるわ！"
